permitHolder: LOVE ME TENDER SCHOOL FOR CHILD DEVELOPMENT INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had age appropriate immunizations unless a child is exempt
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
